data.title: Lady Gaga's Incredible career graph
data.text:
Lady Gaga

The American singer, songwriter and actress was born on March 28, 1986. Today marks her 37th birthday. Her real name is Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta.

Image Makeovers

She is best known for her image makeovers and her musical versatility. She is an accomplished piano player as well.

Teenage Career

She would sing in local clubs at open mic nights and also in her local school productions. She was signed on early by Def Jam Recordings, but her contract was soon canceled.

Songwriter with Sony

She then took up a job as songwriter with Sony/ATV Music Publishing.

Record Deal

She signed up with Interscope Records and KonLive Distribution in 2007 and made her debut album The Fame in 2007. It had two chart-toppers, Just Dance and Poker Face.

The Fame Reissued

The album was reissued in 2007 with added numbers, including hits like Bad Romance, Telephone and Alejandro. Lady Gaga started getting famous.

Topping the US Billboard 200

Her next five albums debuted on top of the US charts, making her first splash after The Fame with Born This Way in 2011.

Born This Way

The album had unprecedented success, selling one million copies in the first week with its title track being downloaded one million times on iTunes.

Jazz and Soft Rock

She toyed with a jazz fourth album titled Cheek to Cheek in 2014 and chose soft rock for her fifth album, Joanne in 2016.

American Horror Story: Hotel

She took up acting in 2015 and starred in the American Horror Story miniseries for two years.

A Star is Born

In 2018, she acted and sang in the film, A Star is Born, based on the old film of the same name. This was the fourth adaptation of the film. Bradley Cooper and Lady Gaga played the leads.

Shallow

The song Shallow from A Star is Born won both an Academy for Best Original Song and the Golden Globe.

Historical Win

Lady Gaga became the first woman in history to win awards in the same year at the Academy Awards, Grammy, BAFTA and Golden Globe for acting or singing in A Star is Born.
